entities: United Nations Support Mission in Libya
summary:
The Security Council, recalling its previous resolutions on Libya, including 1970 (2011), 2259 (2015), 2510 (2020), 2542 (2020), and 2570 (2021), and its determination that the situation in Libya continues to threaten international peace and security, 
Decides to extend the mandate of the United Nations Support Mission in Libya until 30 September 2021, and decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
